vote.title: Authorize the purchase of (1) portable vehicle barricade systems with Security 20/20, Inc dba Security Pro USA through the General Service Administration cooperative agreement in the amount of $243,250; and (2) four custom built trailers to transport the vehicle barricade systems in the amount of $152,180 for the Police Department - Security 20/20, Inc dba Security Pro USA, sole source - Total not to exceed $395,430 - Financing: 2020 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 20-22 Fund
vote.description: Authorize the purchase of (1) portable vehicle barricade systems with Security 20/20, Inc dba Security Pro USA through the General Service Administration cooperative agreement in the amount of $243,250; and (2) four custom built trailers to transport the vehicle barricade systems in the amount of $152,180 for the Police Department - Security 20/20, Inc dba Security Pro USA, sole source - Total not to exceed $395,430 - Financing: 2020 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 20-22 Fund
